title: 2 BED/1 BATH Walk to Journal Square or Grove PATH, no fee!
posting_body: ['No broker fee!', 'Recently renovated and spacious 2 Bed/1 Bath Unit in the desirable Hilltop/Island neighborhood just a short walk to Journal Square path station and also walking distance to downtown Jersey City restaurants and Grove Street path!', 'Safe and quiet family neighborhood with no shortage of on-street parking available due to no houses on the opposite side of the street.', 'Never stress over finding a parking spot again!', 'Ground-floor (formerly owner occupied) Unit includes dishwasher and washer/dryer.', 'Beautiful hardwood floors.', 'Bedrooms large enough for queen-sized beds and desks so you can comfortably work/study from home.', 'Huge shared furnished backyard perfect for outdoor lovers and gardeners.', 'Zoned for top-rated PS-5 elementary school with free Pre-K 3 and a dual language program.', 'Small dogs/cats permitted with additional deposit.', "First month's rent and security deposit (1.5 x rent) due at lease signing.", 'Current building tenants have lived in the building for over 10 years.', ' Good credit and proof of income required.', 'Tenants pay gas/electric.', 'Landlord pays sewer and water.', 'No smoking inside apartment.']
